mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.biz_code ,t.loan_product_code ,t.loan_product_name ,t.user_id ,t.real_name ,t.id_kind ,t.id_no ,t.bankcard_code ,t.ref_type ,t.ref_code
,t.biz_price ,t.sf_rate ,t.sf_amount ,t.loan_bank ,t.loan_amount
,t.periods ,t.rest_periods ,t.bank_rate ,t.bank_benchmark_rate ,t.company_loan_cs ,t.global_rate ,t.loan_start_datetime ,t.loan_end_datetime ,t.bank_fk_datetime
,t.fx_deposit ,t.first_repay_datetime ,t.first_repay_amount ,t.month_datetime ,t.month_amount ,t.ly_deposit
,t.cut_ly_deposit ,t.cur_node_code ,t.fx_amount ,t.rest_amount ,t.rest_total_cost ,t.overdue_total_deposit ,t.overdue_total_deposit_income ,t.total_in_deposit
,t.overdue_amount ,t.total_overdue_count ,t.cur_overdue_count ,t.black_handle_note ,t.paper_photo ,t.is_advance_settled
,t.settle_attach ,t.settle_datetime ,t.release_datetime ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime
,t.remark ,t.team_code ,b.bank_name as loan_bank_name ,b.subbranch as subbranch_bank_name FROM tdh_repay_biz t left join tb_bank b on b.code = t.loan_bank
t.${order}

SELECT t.code ,t.biz_code ,t.loan_product_code ,t.loan_product_name ,t.user_id ,t.real_name ,t.id_kind ,t.id_no ,t.bankcard_code ,t.ref_type ,t.ref_code
,t.biz_price ,t.sf_rate ,t.sf_amount ,t.loan_bank ,t.loan_amount
,t.periods ,t.rest_periods ,t.bank_rate ,t.bank_benchmark_rate ,t.company_loan_cs ,t.global_rate ,t.loan_start_datetime ,t.loan_end_datetime ,t.bank_fk_datetime
,t.fx_deposit ,t.first_repay_datetime ,t.first_repay_amount ,t.month_datetime ,t.month_amount ,t.ly_deposit
,t.cut_ly_deposit ,t.cur_node_code ,t.fx_amount ,t.rest_amount ,t.rest_total_cost ,t.overdue_total_deposit ,t.overdue_total_deposit_income ,t.total_in_deposit
,t.overdue_amount ,t.total_overdue_count ,t.cur_overdue_count ,t.black_handle_note ,t.paper_photo ,t.is_advance_settled
,t.settle_attach ,t.settle_datetime ,t.release_datetime ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime
,t.remark ,t.team_code ,b.bank_name as loan_bank_name ,b.subbranch as subbranch_bank_name FROM tdh_repay_biz t inner join tqj_cdbiz c on c.code = t.biz_code inner join tsys_role_node r on t.cur_node_code = r.node_code left join tb_bank b on b.code = t.loan_bank
t.${order}
